T02TD1544E:184a-1: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD1544E:184a-3: dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1544E:184a-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1544E:184a-5: dpal ldan nges brjod 'bum pa las btus lha mo'i 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1544E:184a-6: sgom pa'i chog sems can don gyi rgyur te drang don dang //
T02TD1544E:184a-7: nges don 'di ste drang pa'i don gyis 'og min gnas grub byed //
T02TD1544E:184a-8: nges pa'i don gyis phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid thob par byed //
T02TD1544E:184a-9: drang don brjod par bya ste dang por re zhig rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bdag bsrung ba'i don du dam tshig gi ri lu khar bcug la phyi nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms te //
T02TD1544E:184a-10: de nas phung po lnga'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-11: gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1544E:184a-12: tshor ba'i phung po la rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1544E:184a-13: 'du shes kyi phung po la padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02TD1544E:184a-14: 'du byed kyi phung po la rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-15: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-17: mig dag la gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-18: rna ba dag la zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-19: sna dag la phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-21: reg la ser sna rdo rje'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-22: skye mched thams cad la dbang phyug rdo rje'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-23: sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-24: chu'i khams ni gsod byed ma'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-26: rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-27: nam mkha'i khams la padmo 'bar ma'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-28: de ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la lha rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-29: de nas rnal 'byor rgyud kyi cho gas gshin rje gshed pa sogs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po dbang po rnams bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgom par bya ste //
T02TD1544E:184a-30: 'khor lo'i gtso bo ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD1544E:184a-31: de yang phyag drug pa'i he ru ka'o //
T02TD1544E:184a-32: sngags pa de yis dang por ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mdun du bsgoms la //
T02TD1544E:184a-33: de'i dbus su h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje gdong bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1544E:184b-0: sna tshogs rdo rje dang @184b nyi ma de dag ro gcig tu gyur pa las phyogs thams cad du rdo rje'i ra ba dang steng du rdo rje'i gur ro //
T02TD1544E:184b-1: 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o //
T02TD1544E:184b-2: ra ba'i phyir rol dang steng 'og tu mtshon cha sna tshogs su rung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1544E:184b-3: khro rgyal rnams la rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:184b-4: gdan ni bstabs par byas nas su //
T02TD1544E:184b-5: zhal mdog phyag dang mtshon cha dang //
T02TD1544E:184b-6: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni //
T02TD1544E:184b-7: rdo rje ra ba'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1544E:184b-8: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la dgod //
T02TD1544E:184b-9: aa yig sa bon las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:184b-10: de ni bsgoms nas de nas yang //
T02TD1544E:184b-11: gur gyi yang ni steng 'og tu //
T02TD1544E:184b-12: rtsibs gnyis kyang ni bya ba ste //
T02TD1544E:184b-13: re pha bcu gcig rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1544E:184b-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:184b-15: nyi ma'i rkang pa de dag kyang //
T02TD1544E:184b-16: nyi ma bcu gcig po nyid kyi //
T02TD1544E:184b-17: so so'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1544E:184b-18: der ni h'um yig dgod par bya //
T02TD1544E:184b-19: h'um yig las byung nyi mar gnas //
T02TD1544E:184b-20: khro rgyal rnams ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1544E:184b-21: dbus ma'i nyi gdan la bsgoms pa //
T02TD1544E:184b-22: 'dren pa rdo rje h'um mdzad de //
T02TD1544E:184b-23: sngon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1544E:184b-24: g-yas brkyang pa ni zhabs kyis mnan //
T02TD1544E:184b-25: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la //
T02TD1544E:184b-26: mi bzad mche gtsigs 'jigs pa po //
T02TD1544E:184b-27: g-yon dang g-yas ni dkar dang dmar //
T02TD1544E:184b-28: ji ltar rtsa gsum gnas pa'o //
T02TD1544E:184b-29: rdo rje gri gug rtse gsum pa //
T02TD1544E:184b-30: g-yas pa'i phyag ni rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:184b-31: rdo rje dril bu thod pa dang //
T02TD1544E:184b-33: sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa yi //
T02TD1544E:184b-34: cod pan mi bskyod zla phyed yin //
T02TD1544E:184b-35: mgo bo'i phreng ba phrag la gnas //
T02TD1544E:184b-36: spyi bo la ni thod pa nyid //
T02TD1544E:184b-37: phyag rgya lnga ni rus las byas //
T02TD1544E:184b-38: rked pa stag gi pags pas dkris //
T02TD1544E:184b-39: spyan dgu ljags ni bsgyur ba ste //
T02TD1544E:184b-40: sprul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa'o //
T02TD1544E:184b-42: 'dren pa bsgom mo de nas ni //
T02TD1544E:184b-43: h'um yig nag po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:184b-44: shar gyi nyi mar dgod par bya //
T02TD1544E:184b-45: gshin rje gshed nag drag pa ste //
T02TD1544E:184b-46: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan //
T02TD1544E:184b-47: gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:184b-48: gsus khyim che la spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1544E:184b-49: phyag rgya lnga dang thod pa yi //
T02TD1544E:184b-50: phreng ba rked la stag lpags so //
T02TD1544E:184b-51: kun gyi cod pan tha dad dang //
T02TD1544E:184b-52: sku mdog mtshon cha de dag la //
T02TD1544E:185a-2: dbyug pa 'khor lo rdo rje dag / g-yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje bdag / snying gar sdigs mdzub zhabs pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185a-3: dril bu dgra sta g-yon bsnams la //
T02TD1544E:185a-4: spyi bo sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1544E:185a-5: rdo rje cod pan gzhan min pa'o //
T02TD1544E:185a-6: h'um yig dkar po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185a-7: dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185a-8: shes rab mthar byad nyi mar dgod //
T02TD1544E:185a-9: lho ru rin chen cod pan can //
T02TD1544E:185a-10: ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa ni //
T02TD1544E:185a-11: g-yas pa'i phyag na rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:185a-12: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhabs pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185a-13: dril bu dgra sta g-yon pa ni //
T02TD1544E:185a-14: h'um yig dmar po las grub pa //
T02TD1544E:185a-15: dmar dang sngo dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185a-16: padma mthar byed nyi mar dgod //
T02TD1544E:185a-17: nub tu 'od dpag med cod pan //
T02TD1544E:185a-18: gtun shing rdo rje ral gri bsnams //
T02TD1544E:185a-20: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhabs pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185a-21: dril bu dgra sna g-yon pa la //
T02TD1544E:185a-22: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185a-23: don yod grub pa'i cod pan can //
T02TD1544E:185a-24: sngon dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185a-26: sna tshogs rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02TD1544E:185a-27: 'khor lo gtun shing g-yas pa na //
T02TD1544E:185a-28: dril bu sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185a-29: dgra sta yang ni g-yon pa na //
T02TD1544E:185a-30: bgegs mthar byed pa nyi mar dgod //
T02TD1544E:185a-31: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang //
T02TD1544E:185a-32: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185a-33: me ru nyi ma mi g-yo dgod //
T02TD1544E:185a-34: sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185a-35: dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal //
T02TD1544E:185a-36: ral gri rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02TD1544E:185a-37: 'khor lo g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams //
T02TD1544E:185a-38: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185a-39: dril bu dgra sta g-yon na'o //
T02TD1544E:185a-40: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185a-41: sdo dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185a-42: srin por 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste //
T02TD1544E:185a-43: rin chen 'byung ldan cod pan can //
T02TD1544E:185a-44: phyag gnyis khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi //
T02TD1544E:185a-45: phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa'o //
T02TD1544E:185a-46: g-yas na rdo rje ral gri ste //
T02TD1544E:185a-47: g-yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1544E:185a-48: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185a-49: 'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can //
T02TD1544E:185a-50: sngags pas dbyug sngon dgod par bya //
T02TD1544E:185a-51: rlung du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1544E:185a-52: rtsa ba g-yas dang cig shos dag / sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185b-0: dbyug pa de @185b bzhin ral gri ste //
T02TD1544E:185b-1: rdo rje phyag g-yas rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:185b-2: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185b-3: padma nyi ma nyid yon no //
T02TD1544E:185b-4: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185b-5: don yod grub pa'i don pan can //
T02TD1544E:185b-6: stobs po che ni sku mdog sngo //
T02TD1544E:185b-7: dbang ldan nyi mar sngags pas dgod //
T02TD1544E:185b-8: nag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185b-10: dbyug pa ral gri de bzhin du //
T02TD1544E:185b-11: 'khor lo g-yas la rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:185b-12: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185b-13: rtse gsum dgra ste rim pas so //
T02TD1544E:185b-14: h'um yig ljang gu las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185b-15: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
T02TD1544E:185b-16: ljang gu dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185b-17: spyan gsum khyab bdag gsus pa 'phyang //
T02TD1544E:185b-18: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis //
T02TD1544E:185b-19: spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin par mdzad //
T02TD1544E:185b-20: rdo rje padma g-yas dag la //
T02TD1544E:185b-21: gzhan la sdig mdzub ral gri'o //
T02TD1544E:185b-22: nam mkhar nyi ma gnod pa ni //
T02TD1544E:185b-23: tshangs pa'i gnas su rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1544E:185b-24: sngon po'i h'um yig las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:185b-25: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
T02TD1544E:185b-26: 'og gi nyi mar gnod mdzes rgyal //
T02TD1544E:185b-27: gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1544E:185b-28: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dag / g-yas pa'i 'jig rten rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1544E:185b-29: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02TD1544E:185b-30: ral gri padma g-yon pa la //
T02TD1544E:185b-31: de rnams rnam par bsgoms nas su //
T02TD1544E:185b-32: 'jigs byed khro bo dgod pa ni //
T02TD1544E:185b-33: rnal 'byor pa yis nye bar bsdus //
T02TD1544E:185b-34: rang gi lus la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1544E:185b-35: dpung pa g-yon par gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1544E:185b-36: g-yas par shes rab mthar byed dgod //
T02TD1544E:185b-37: lag g-yon padma mthar byed do //
T02TD1544E:185b-38: g-yas la bgegs mthar byed pa dgod //
T02TD1544E:185b-39: g-yon pa'i brla la mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1544E:185b-41: rkang pa g-yon la dbyug sngon te //
T02TD1544E:185b-42: rkang pa g-yas pa stobs po che //
T02TD1544E:185b-43: spyi gtsug gnas su gtsug tor che //
T02TD1544E:185b-44: gnod mdzes rgyal po bshad lam dgod //
T02TD1544E:185b-45: snying gar rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02TD1544E:185b-46: rang mtshan yi ge dang po dgod //
T02TD1544E:185b-47: yam pram bam bam aam tam nam mam aum sum bam /
T02TD1544E:185b-48: de ltar bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD1544E:185b-49: sngags pas rim bzhin byas nas ni //
T02TD1544E:185b-50: bdag nyid khro bcas rdo rje yis //
T02TD1544E:185b-51: h'um mdzad du ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1544E:186a-1: gnod mdzes bka' bsgo phur bus gdab //
T02TD1544E:186a-2: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya h'a ta ya sarba dusht'am phat /
T02TD1544E:186a-3: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02TD1544E:186a-4: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02TD1544E:186a-6: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:186a-7: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'am bidy'i r'a dza h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:186a-8: khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni //
T02TD1544E:186a-9: log 'dren bgegs rnams kun nas ni //
T02TD1544E:186a-10: cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab //
T02TD1544E:186a-12: thams cad la'o lte ba nas //
T02TD1544E:186a-13: 'og gi cha ni mdung ltar du //
T02TD1544E:186a-14: rnam bsam khro chen bgegs mthar byed //
T02TD1544E:186a-15: stod ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1544E:186a-16: 'og gi bgegs tshogs la gzigs nas //
T02TD1544E:186a-17: de nas sngags ni yang dag brjod //
T02TD1544E:186a-18: rdo rje phur bu gzung nas ni //
T02TD1544E:186a-19: bgegs kyi lus la g-yo ba med /
T02TD1544E:186a-20: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba du sht'am h'um phat //
T02TD1544E:186a-21: k'i la k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02TD1544E:186a-22: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02TD1544E:186a-23: sarba bighn'am k'a ya w'aka tsittam k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:186a-24: rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams pa'i //
T02TD1544E:186a-25: gnod mdzes rgyas po bsgom par bya //
T02TD1544E:186a-26: sngags rig pa yi cho ga 'dis //
T02TD1544E:186a-27: rdo rje phur bus brdung bar bya //
T02TD1544E:186a-28: aom badzra mudga ra a'a ko ta ya /
T02TD1544E:186a-29: tishtha tishtha da sha ti k'i la ye /
T02TD1544E:186a-31: de nas kun nas rdo rje'i ma //
T02TD1544E:186a-32: rnam par 'phro ba nges par bsam //
T02TD1544E:186a-33: de de de yi sreg bzhin du //
T02TD1544E:186a-35: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD1544E:186a-36: de'i steng du bam yig 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1544E:186a-37: de'i snang bas mdun du bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams bltas la yang dag par mchod de phyag byas bzod pa gsol /
T02TD1544E:186a-38: de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD1544E:186a-39: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham //
T02TD1544E:186a-40: yang ni stong par rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1544E:186a-41: sems tsam la ni nges gnas te //
T02TD1544E:186a-42: byang chub tshogs ni bsgoms pa yis //
T02TD1544E:186a-43: snang ba tsam gyis shes pa la /
T02TD1544E:186a-44: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dznya na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1544E:186a-45: de nas sad nas rten dang brten pa'i tshul gyis bhee ram la sogs pa yang dag par gnas pa rnam par bsam mo //
T02TD1544E:186a-46: yi yig yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1544E:186b-0: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyal @186b mtshan gyis mtshan pa gzhu'i dbyibs can kha dog sngon po'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-1: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-2: de'i steng du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-3: de'i steng du lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi kha dog ser po'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-4: de'i steng du sum yig yongs su g-yo ba las ri'i rgyal po ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-5: de'i steng du h'um las nges par 'byung ba sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-6: de'i steng du pam yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba dang ge sar du bcas pa'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-7: de'i steng du a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba ste //
T02TD1544E:186b-8: me long lta bu'i ye shes zla ba dang /
T02TD1544E:186b-9: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyi ma'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-10: de dag tu srog song ba ni bam yig tu brjod de so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD1544E:186b-11: de dag gcig tu gyur pa bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02TD1544E:186b-12: gzugs yongs su grub pa ni chos nyid dag pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD1544E:186b-13: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid lus //
T02TD1544E:186b-14: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ru grags //
T02TD1544E:186b-15: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje phag mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing 'jigs byed dang //
T02TD1544E:186b-16: dus mtshan ma mnan pa 'khor lo dang bcas sgrub pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-17: de la bcom ldan 'das ma ni sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma spyan gsum ma dbu skra grol ba gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i ske rags can /
T02TD1544E:186b-18: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02TD1544E:186b-19: 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs can /
T02TD1544E:186b-20: g-yon pa'i phyag na rdo rje kha tv'am ga dang thod par bdud ma rungs pa'i khrag bsnams pa /
T02TD1544E:186b-21: g-yas pas phyogs thams cad du gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'i rdo rje can /
T02TD1544E:186b-22: bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid che //
T02TD1544E:186b-23: khrag la dgyes shing khrag 'dzag pa //
T02TD1544E:186b-24: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1544E:186b-25: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1544E:186b-26: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02TD1544E:186b-27: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
T02TD1544E:186b-28: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
T02TD1544E:186b-29: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can /
T02TD1544E:186b-30: rig pa 'dis ni spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa ste /
T02TD1544E:187a-0: sna tshogs pa padma'i lte bar rtsa ba'i gdan du @187a * //
T02TD1544E:187a-1: rigs ldan ma rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-2: padma'i shar gyi 'dab mar shar gyi lus 'phags bdag gi gdan du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-3: lho'i 'dab mar 'dzam bu'i gling gzhan gyi gdan du l'a ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-4: nub kyi 'dab ma rab longs spyod sngags kyi gdan du kha nda ro h'a'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-5: byang gi 'dab mar sgra mi snyan de kho na nyid kyi gdan du gzugs can ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-6: thugs gsung ye shes sku ste 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye bas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma bzhi nag mo dmar mo ser mo ljang gu ste dngos grub mdzad ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-8: g-yon gyis kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1544E:187a-9: g-yas kyis cang te'u dang gri gug go //
T02TD1544E:187a-10: spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba gcer bu g-yas brkyang bas gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02TD1544E:187a-11: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan ma /
T02TD1544E:187a-12: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal /
T02TD1544E:187a-16: don yod grub pas rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams la rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-17: mtshams su gling phran nye ba'i gnas su byang chub kyi sems kyi snod bzhi ste ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1544E:187a-18: de nas sa 'og me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su ri rab kyi phyogs mtshams su dmyal ba chen po brgyad de /
T02TD1544E:187a-19: de la shar gyi dur khrod dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor mdung gis 'phigs par khva gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-20: lho'i dur khrod sgor tshig pa'i ror 'ug gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-21: nub kyi dur khrod sgor brnags pa'i drir khyi gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-22: byang gi dur khrod sgror rul pa can du phag gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-23: de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dur khrod byis pa shi par gshin rje brtan mo'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-24: rlung gi mtshams su dur khrod sprul gyis zin par gshin rje pho nya mo'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-25: srin po'i mtshams su dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su gshin rje mche ba ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187a-26: me'i mtshams kyi dur khrod lhag ma can du gshin rje 'joms ma'o//
T02TD1544E:187a-27: de ltar na g-yas skor dang g-yon skor gyis lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pas dur khrod brgyad du longs spyod ma rnams te /
T02TD1544E:187a-28: ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma lus la sogs pa de ltar khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang rgyas gdab kyang ngo //
T02TD1544E:187b-0: mtshams su gnas ma @187b rnams ni gzugs gnyis ma yid 'phrog pa sems can gyi don mdzad par brtson pa'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-1: rnal 'byor ma 'di dag thams cad yi dags kyi gdan can mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-2: de nas gzhan yang bcu gnyis lha'i rnal 'byor gyis sbyar bar bya ste /
T02TD1544E:187b-3: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD1544E:187b-4: rab tu dga' ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-5: dri ma med pa ni l'a ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-6: 'od byed pa ni khanda ro h'i'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-8: sbyang dka' ba ni khva gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-9: mngon du gyur pa ni lug gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-10: ring du song ba ni khyi gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-11: mi g-yo ba ni phag gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-12: legs pa'i blo gros ni gshin rje brtan ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-13: chos kyi sprin ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa can ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-15: rdo rje spyod pa can ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-16: dbus kyi rdo rje phag mo ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bcu rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-17: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02TD1544E:187b-18: gnas sogs ming yig dang po'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-19: rang gi lus la dgod par bya //
T02TD1544E:187b-20: mum a'am pam mam tam shum sham phum glam blam slam gham aum /
T02TD1544E:187b-21: rtsa ba'i gdan gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-22: bdag gi gdan snying gi padmar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-23: gzhan gyi gdan lkog ma'i padmar lnga ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-24: sngags kyi gdan lte ba'i padmar khanda ro ha'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-25: de kho na nyid kyi gdan dpral bar gzugs can ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-26: thams cad padma'i gdan gtsug tor gyi padmar dpal he ru ka'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-27: 'di dag ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste g-yas skor gyis so //
T02TD1544E:187b-28: khva gdong ma la sogs pa sgo brgyad du dgod pa brjod par bya ste //
T02TD1544E:187b-29: mdung gis 'bigs pa kha'i sgor khva gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-30: tshig pa'i ro sna bug g-yas kyi sgor 'ug gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-31: brnags pa'i drir bshad pa'i sgor khyi gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-32: rul pa can sna bug g-yon pa'i sgor phag gdong ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-34: byis pa shi ba rna ba g-yon pa'i sgor gshin rje brtan ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-35: sbrul gyis zos pa rna ba g-yas pa'i sgor gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-36: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su mig g-yas pa'i sgor gshin rje mche ba can ma'o //
T02TD1544E:187b-37: lhag ma spyan mig g-yon pa'i sgor gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-2: skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag / skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur //
T02TD1544E:188a-3: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD1544E:188a-5: sarba b'i ra yo gi ni k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra sba bha wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1544E:188a-6: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02TD1544E:188a-7: de nas go cha gnyis shes nas //
T02TD1544E:188a-8: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par sgom //
T02TD1544E:188a-9: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor shes pas //
T02TD1544E:188a-10: dam tshig 'khor lo ma myur gzhug / de nas go cha gnyis bshad par bya ste //
T02TD1544E:188a-12: na ma: hi spyi bor ro //
T02TD1544E:188a-13: sv'a h'a hu gtsug tor tu'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-14: po sha ta he phrag pa gnyis su'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-15: h'um h'um ho mig gnyis la'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-16: phat ham yan lag thams cad la ste mtshon cha'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-17: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i ste //
T02TD1544E:188a-18: gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs //
T02TD1544E:188a-19: gsum pa padma gar dbang phyug / bzhi pa dpal ldan he ru kar brjod //
T02TD1544E:188a-20: rdo rje nyi ma rta mchog ste //
T02TD1544E:188a-21: go cha drug gis 'di la bsrungs //
T02TD1544E:188a-22: aom bam rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-27: phat phat tsandi ka ste yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-28: lte ba snying ga de bzhin kha //
T02TD1544E:188a-29: mgo dang spyi gtsug mtshon cha nyid //
T02TD1544E:188a-30: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
T02TD1544E:188a-31: mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar //
T02TD1544E:188a-32: de nas dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas //
T02TD1544E:188a-33: bskor zhing bskor bas kun du sgyur bar byed pa ste //
T02TD1544E:188a-34: rkang pa mnan zhing gyen du blta //
T02TD1544E:188a-35: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02TD1544E:188a-36: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1544E:188a-37: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug / aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02TD1544E:188a-38: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1544E:188a-39: de bzhin kun du khrus gsol ba //
T02TD1544E:188a-40: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1544E:188a-41: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD1544E:188a-44: rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags bzla zhing sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD1544E:188a-45: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1544E:188a-46: 'di ni snying po'i sngags yi ge bcu pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dag pa'o //
T02TD1544E:188a-47: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02TD1544E:188b-0: nye ba'i snying @188b po'i sngags yi ge bcu dgu po'i //
T02TD1544E:188b-1: aom pam yom mom hrem hrim h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-2: 'di ni yi ge brgyad pa'i go cha'i sngags so //
T02TD1544E:188b-3: aom sum bha ni sum bha badzra d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-4: bcu bzhi pa shar gyi zhal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1544E:188b-5: aom grihna grihna badzra l'a me h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-6: yi ge bcu gnyis pa lho'i zhal l'a ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1544E:188b-7: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya badzra khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-8: yi ge bco brgyad pa nub kyi zhal khanda ro h'i'i sngags so //
T02TD1544E:188b-9: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'am badzra r'a dza badzra r'u pi ni h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-10: yi ge bco brgyad pa byang gi zhal gzugs can ma'i sngags so //
T02TD1544E:188b-11: lha mo bzhi ste gling bzhi pa'i sngags so ;
T02TD1544E:188b-12: / aom na mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ya badzra k'a k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-13: aom ma h'a ka lp'a gni sam ni bh'a ya badzra au lu k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-14: aom dza ta ma ku totka t'a ya badzra shva n'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-15: aom damsht'a ka r'a gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya badzra s'u k'a r'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-16: aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a sur'a ya ya ma da dhi h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-17: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la kha tvam ga dha ri ne badzra ya ma d'u t'i h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-18: aom by'a ghr'a dzi na aam ba ra bha r'a ya badzra ya ma dam sht'a ni h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-19: aom ma h'a dhum mbran dha k'a ra wa bu sh'a ya badzra ya ma ma th'a n'i ye h'um h'um phat //
T02TD1544E:188b-20: lha mo brgyad kyi rkang pa brgyad kyi sngags so //
T02TD1544E:188b-21: gtor ma spyad ba'i sngags ni /
T02TD1544E:188b-22: aom badzra kro dhe shva ri sarba dra bya ni bi shva dha ni h'um phat /
T02TD1544E:188b-25: h'um gis gzi brjod bskyid pa'o //
T02TD1544E:188b-28: ksha yig gis gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02TD1544E:188b-29: lag pa g-yon pas ni sbyang ba'o //
T02TD1544E:188b-30: g-yas kyis ni rtogs par bya'o //
T02TD1544E:188b-31: thal mo gshibs te brkyang bas don ni gzi brjid bskyed do //
T02TD1544E:188b-32: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas ni bdud rtsis bya'o //
T02TD1544E:188b-33: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi phyag rgyas ni dgug go //
T02TD1544E:188b-34: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas ni stab cing lag pa'i rgyab tu se gol gsum gyis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1544E:188b-36: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho //
T02TD1544E:188b-37: mtshan phyed na rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye la gtar ma gtang ngo //
T02TD1544E:188b-38: aom kha kha kh'a he kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'aksha sa /
T02TD1544E:188b-44: ai mam pa lim grihna na tu /
T02TD1544E:189a-7: ma ma sarba ka ra ta ya /
T02TD1544E:189a-8: sadgu kham bi bri ddha ye sa h'a yi ka bha bandu hum h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-9: gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1544E:189a-10: yul dang grong gi bdag po la gtor ma sbyin te /
T02TD1544E:189a-11: yi ge mi mnyam pa ni thog ma'am dbus sam tha ma'i yi ge'o //
T02TD1544E:189a-12: yi ge mnyam pa ni dang po'am tha ma'i yi ge'o //
T02TD1544E:189a-13: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1544E:189a-14: aom a'a: h'um kshe tra ba la ba li grihna grihna sa pa ri w'a re bhya: sarba sa tva n'am sh'i ti tsetta ni ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-15: aom ha ri ti pande kye pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-16: 'phrog ma la chang bu gnyis byin nas /
T02TD1544E:189a-17: aom du ti kye aa gra gra sam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-18: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi au tsi shta ba lim au tsi shta bhaksha bhaksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-19: bstabs pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1544E:189a-20: aom aa ho ksha rim pas gnas pa rnams kyis sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD1544E:189a-21: zla ba zhu ba lta bur bsgom ste /
T02TD1544E:189a-22: rim gyis snod de nas ni thig le zla ba'i 'od zer dag gis nges par lag pa'i padma'i ming med nis gzhir phyi rol ni /
T02TD1544E:189a-23: gru gsum byas nas nang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i zlum po de'i dbus su ni /
T02TD1544E:189a-24: ye shes 'khor lo srid pa gsum yang chud pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam bya dang /
T02TD1544E:189a-25: zhing gsal de la sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis bstabs par bya ste /
T02TD1544E:189a-26: aom a'a: h'um ho sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la'o //
T02TD1544E:189a-27: de nas aa a'a ai a'i ri r'i au a'u li l'i aam a'a: / rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i phung po dang /
T02TD1544E:189a-28: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams rnams so //
T02TD1544E:189a-29: aa a'a ae aee aar a'ar ao aoo aa la a'a la aam aa: / dbang po drug dang yul drug go //
T02TD1544E:189a-30: ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a ham ha: / thabs dang shes rab kyi lus can rnams te /
T02TD1544E:189a-31: las kyi dbang po zhe sdang rdo rje las sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1544E:189a-32: ka k'a kha kh'a ga g'a gha gh'a da d'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-33: tsa ts'a tsha tsh'a dza dz'a dzha dzh'u nya ny'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-34: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-35: pa p'a pha ph'a ba b'a bha bh'a ma m'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-36: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-37: sa s'a da d'a sha sh'a sha sh'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-38: thka thk'a ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a la l'a wa w'a ksha ksh'a /
T02TD1544E:189a-39: thabs dang shes rab sum cu rtsa drug gi rigs rnams la rnal 'byor bas bstabs pa'i cho ga 'di dag par bya'o //
T02TD1544E:189a-40: phung po drug po gzugs sogs ni //
T02TD1544E:189a-41: sum cu rtsa drug rtag tu mchod //
T02TD1544E:189a-42: sa chu dang ni me dang rlung //
T02TD1544E:189a-43: de bzhin khu ba dang na rdul//
T02TD1544E:189b-0: @189b khams drug tu ni 'di la bshad //
T02TD1544E:189b-1: lus can rnams kyi gzugs po'o //
T02TD1544E:189b-2: lkog ma rka na dang spyi bo dang //
T02TD1544E:189b-3: mchu dang so rjes sna ldan te //
T02TD1544E:189b-4: 'du shes kyang ni drug tu bshad //
T02TD1544E:189b-5: dngos dang dngos med ston byed pa //
T02TD1544E:189b-6: blta dang nyan dang snom pa dang //
T02TD1544E:189b-7: lce lus yid kyi dbang rnams kyis //
T02TD1544E:189b-8: mig la sogs pa rnam pa drug / rnam shes phung por bshad pa yin //
T02TD1544E:189b-9: de bzhin gzugs dang sgra dang ni //
T02TD1544E:189b-10: dri dang yang ni ro dang ste //
T02TD1544E:189b-11: reg bya dang ni chos kyi khams //
T02TD1544E:189b-12: myong ba las ni tshor bar brjod //
T02TD1544E:189b-13: de bzhin dbang po drug sgo nas //
T02TD1544E:189b-14: rnam par shes rnams rab 'jug pa //
T02TD1544E:189b-15: 'du byed rnam pa drug tu brjod //
T02TD1544E:189b-16: yul rnams la ni 'jug byed pa'i //
T02TD1544E:189b-17: srog dang rtsol ba'i nyin mtshan gang //
T02TD1544E:189b-18: steng dang 'og gi lam gsum du //
T02TD1544E:189b-19: rtsa ni drug po rab rgyu ba //
T02TD1544E:189b-20: ye shes kyang ni rnam pa drug //
T02TD1544E:189b-21: sum cu bdun nga sems chen po //
T02TD1544E:189b-22: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1544E:189b-23: khams rnams kyis bskor rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1544E:189b-24: lha yi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor spyod //
T02TD1544E:189b-25: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin //
T02TD1544E:189b-26: mgrin pa'i mgul dngos rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1544E:189b-27: lha yi snying po'i sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1544E:189b-28: phreng ba brgya yi phyed kyis brgyan //
T02TD1544E:189b-29: yi ge bdun pa'i sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1544E:189b-30: rna cha yis ni rna ba brgyan //
T02TD1544E:189b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro mas //
T02TD1544E:189b-32: lag pa gnyis kyis gdu bu'o //
T02TD1544E:189b-33: rnal 'byor ma drag sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1544E:189b-34: ske rags kyis ni rkang pa brgyan //
T02TD1544E:189b-36: sngags kyis btung ba'i thod pa yin //
T02TD1544E:189b-37: rnam par snang mdzad sngags gang yin //
T02TD1544E:189b-38: thod pas mgo bo rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1544E:189b-39: de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams nas //
T02TD1544E:189b-40: tsham dam sngags kyis shin tu bsrung //
T02TD1544E:189b-41: tshangs par spyod pa rtag 'gyur bas //
T02TD1544E:189b-43: de ltar legs bsams rnal 'byor bdag //
T02TD1544E:189b-44: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD1544E:189b-45: de nyid rnal 'byor yang dag ldan //
T02TD1544E:189b-46: rnal 'byor blo ldan rnam par spyod //
T02TD1544E:189b-47: nges pa'i don gyis lha mo bsgom pa brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1544E:189b-49: dngos pos stong don mthong phyir ro //
T02TD1544E:189b-50: sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'phrul bzhin //
T02TD1544E:189b-51: snang ba tsam gyis ye shes ni //
T02TD1544E:189b-52: skye med dang bzhin 'jig rten gsum //
T02TD1544E:189b-53: lus gnas ye shes chen po la //
T02TD1544E:190a-0: @190a * // kun du rtogs pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD1544E:190a-1: dngos po kun gyis khyab byed de //
T02TD1544E:190a-2: lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min //
T02TD1544E:190a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyis sdom pa ni //
T02TD1544E:190a-4: aa wam yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02TD1544E:190a-5: lus ngag yid kyi rtsa gsum la //
T02TD1544E:190a-6: lus ngag yid kyi dngos po rnams //
T02TD1544E:190a-7: rdo rje gsum rnams yang dag spyod //
T02TD1544E:190a-8: dung can mar ni ye shes dngos //
T02TD1544E:190a-9: de bzhin lha mo mkha' 'gro gdong //
T02TD1544E:190a-10: ae w'a yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02TD1544E:190a-11: yi ge ae yis stong nyid rgyu //
T02TD1544E:190a-12: wam yig gis ni snying rje 'bar //
T02TD1544E:190a-13: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la //
T02TD1544E:190a-14: byang chub sems zhes de la brjod //
T02TD1544E:190a-15: sems ni nam mkhar zhe na pas ni //
T02TD1544E:190a-16: mig ni phab ste rdo rje yi //
T02TD1544E:190a-17: lam du rab tu chud byas pas //
T02TD1544E:190a-18: stong pa la ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri med srin bu me khyer sgron ma nyid //
T02TD1544E:190a-19: 'bar ba dang ni zla nyi rdo rje yang ni mchog gi cha ni mthong gyur thig le can //
T02TD1544E:190a-20: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul las rnam grol longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o //
T02TD1544E:190a-21: ji ltar chu la chu 'dres dang //
T02TD1544E:190a-22: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02TD1544E:190a-23: rang gi ye shes lnga yi dngos //
T02TD1544E:190a-25: dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos //
T02TD1544E:190a-26: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02TD1544E:190a-27: de bas dngos po dngos med pas //
T02TD1544E:190a-28: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02TD1544E:190a-29: gang su dag gi mthu yis ni //
T02TD1544E:190a-30: gang du der ni yang dag gnas //
T02TD1544E:190a-31: dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs pas //
T02TD1544E:190a-33: de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub ho //
T02TD1544E:190a-35: phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgoms la //
T02TD1544E:190a-36: yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i //
T02TD1544E:190a-37: rdo rje stong pa nyid du brjod //
T02TD1544E:190a-38: phag mo yang ni snying rjer grags //
T02TD1544E:190a-40: stong nyid snying rje gcig pa la //
T02TD1544E:190a-41: rdo rje phag mo zhes su brjod //
T02TD1544E:190a-42: 'di ni bdag gis nges pa'i don bsgom pa bshad pa yin no //
T02TD1544E:190a-43: dpal rgya nag byang phyogs lam gyi rim pa //
T02TD1544E:190a-44: rje btsun rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po seng ge'i gdong can khyab 'jug spangs pas nges par sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T02TD1544E:190a-46: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal aa wa dh'u t'i pa chen po //
T02TD1544E:190a-47: rgyal po'i spas 'jigs med lha'i zhal sngar sh'a kya'i dge slong rje btsun pa dzny'a k'i rtis bsgyur ba'o /
